td.content: s:female aged 67 ys presents with 2 months history of critical shortness of breath. she consumes 2 drinks per night smokes 1 pack/day o:Height 150 cm, Weight 70.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, wheeze-RU, CTA-LR a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.
